short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launch your Adomni-powered digital signage at the click of a button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run your digital signage and showing advertisements with the click of a button!  For Adomni customers, you can easily convert any computer that can run Chrome into a digital sign - just install the plugin, then login to your Adomni account.  Go to the page of your board and click the Adomni plugin icon - boom!  A tab will open with the content for that board playing.  Click it again to go fullscreen and you are up and running.  Hit escape to shut it back down and return to your computer.  It's just that easy.
